Name: News Reporter
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, draw a card.

Name: Paramedic
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, you may KO a Wound from your hand or from any player's discard pile.

Name: Radiation Scientist
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, you may KO one of your Heroes or a Hero from your discard pile.

Name: Computer Hacker
Text: When you kidnap this Bystander, draw an extra card when you draw a new hand at the end of your turn.

Name: Engineer
Text: When you kidnap this Bystander, reveal the top card of your deck. If it costs 0 - KO it.

Name: Public Speaker
Text: When you kidnap this Bystander, gain 1 recruit.

Name: Rockstar
Text: When you kidnap this Bystander, kidnap another Bystander.

Name: Banker
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, you get +2 Recruit, usable only to recruit Heroes in the HQ space under the Bank.

Name: Alligator Trapper
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, Patrol the Sewers: If it's empty, you get +2 Recruit.

Name: Shapeshifted Copycat
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, this card becomes a Villain with 3 Attack and enters the city. It gains the ability: "Fight: KO one of your Heroes.

Name: Undercover Agent
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, a player of your choice gains a S.H.I.E.L.D. Officer.

Name: Aspiring Hero
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, gain a Sidekick.

Name: Comic Shop Keeper
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, reveal the top three cards of the Hero Deck. The player of your choice gains one of them that costs 3 or less. Put the rest back in any order.

Name: Bulldozer Driver
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, you may move a Villain to an adjacent city space. If another Villain is already there, swap them.

Name: Double Agent Of S.H.I.E.L.D.
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, play a copy of one of your S.H.I.E.L.D. Heroes or HYDRA allies.

Name: Fortune Teller
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, guess "zero" or "not zero." Then reveal the top card of your deck and check its cost. If you guessed right, draw that card.

Name: Photographer
Text: This Bystander is worth +1 VP for each Hero you have that costs 7 or more among all your cards at the end of the game.

Name: Stan Lee
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, say a Hero name. Then reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put one of those cards with that exact Hero name into your hand. Put the rest back in any order.

Name: Detective Wolverine
Text: When you rescue this Bystander, Investigate the Villain Deck for a Villain worth 1 VP and put it in your Victory Pile.
